name: Dark/Night Facebook Messenger
description: A dark/night theme for Facebook's inbox/messages and messenger.com. Coloured chat bubbles can be turned on/off. UserCSS version can be found here on GitHub. Additional screenshots can also be found on GitHub. I highly recommend switching to the UserCSS version for more frequent updates (and using Stylus)! Feel free to tell me any suggestions, or let me know about any issues. Enjoy!

user.name: cicerakes
user.about: No updates or responses here, check GitHub for latest updates! My styles aim to: - Darken the colours while keeping most, if not all, of the site's original design. - Optionally hide ads and other potentially unwanted features. - Sometimes both.
